attributes.action: Reintroduce the death penalty for child murder.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Baby P lived a short and miserable life and was systematically tortured neglected and abused. He  died a long slow and lonely death. When he died he had 8 broken ribs a broken back, missing fingernails, the tips of some fingers were missing, multiple cuts bruises and bite marks visible for all to see. ENOUGH IS ENOUGH I don’t think for one moment that the death penalty will ever stop this butchery of the innocent.
But it will sure make me sleep a lot easier knowing that they too have paid with their lives.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
